thread.section_title: Personal Comfort Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personal Comfort | personalcomfortbed.com
thread.title: Kristin Jaeckel
thread.title_full: Personal Comfort reviewed by Kristin Jaeckel

author: Kristin Jaeckel
title: Kristin Jaeckel
text:
This was definitely not worth the money. I can't tell a difference in my back pain at all and could have gotten a more "comfortable" bed for much less money.
It's also a scam to say it can be returned in 90 days because you have to get it in the original packaging which was vacuum sealed so there is literally no way you can return it.
